page.title: 17Pop Culture In Johnstone
page.content: Probably due to having nothing much to do, many boys in Spateston form pop groups, mostly Punk bands. Walking through Spateston at night, you can hear bands practising from bedrooms.The music blasts out; sometimes good, sometimes bad. Occasionaly a few of the bands get the chance to play at the Youth Club to an audience of about 150. The most popular at the Youth Club is "First Aid" now renamed "Discharge". Most groups haven't any ideas of making it big in the pop world and making records, though many songs played by the groups could match any records in the charts at the moment. A group who have done well so far are "Question the Peasant". They have had demo tapes made, played a few gigs, and have ben mentioned in local newspapers in small articles.
